issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Alloy
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the Alloy here.

fields.description:
In an Alloy project, compiled on Windows, where there is a folder in "Resources"  called "iphone" this folder is added to the "build" folder when using Ti build. 

To be clear:

Project > Resources > iphone  

is compiled into 

build > mobileweb > iphone
build > android > assets > iphone (and then into the apk)
fields.summary: iphone assets are compiled into Android & Web Apps

comments.body: I have not been able to reproduce this issue. Please zip up content of iPhone folder so that I can drop it in my project and try to reproduce this issue. Let me also know the build type you are using.
Resolving this ticket as the reporter has not provided the requested information. We would be happy to reopen this ticket once we have the requested information available.
